DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter , pre-operative Phase II study design estimate efficacy ipatasertib combine paclitaxel chemotherapy versus placebo combine paclitaxel chemotherapy woman Stage Ia - IIIa triple-negative breast adenocarcinoma . The anticipated time study treatment 12 week . The target sample size 130 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Ipatasertib ( GDC-0068 ) Combination With Paclitaxel Neoadjuvant Treatment Patients With Early Stage Triple Negative Breast Cancer
